snippet.title: Env_Roomtype Demonstration
snippet.description:
We have implemented a new sound effects management system for our weapons.
Each weapon can now play a different variety of sounds based on the environment location.
This feature works by itself, but also operates alongside env_soundscapes to add even more variety to the way the sfx sound.

#OperationBlackMesa #GuardDuty #GameDev
